Package models

Class DrinkModel

java.lang.Object
models.DrinkModel
public class DrinkModel extends Object
DrinkModel class is responsible for managing drinks in the restaurant. It provides methods to add, update, delete, and retrieve drinks from the drink table in the database.
Since:
2021-09-01
